pages.text: Now you should have at least one croparia.$(br)Congratulation ! You can craft your first seeds ! Once it is done, lets take a look at some ways to improve the efficiency.

pages.text: This is an exemple. Each seed will need 4 regular seeds, 4 'type' items and 1 croparia with a special tier.
